Title: Relates to establishing a computerized database containing information relating to the storage and handling of hazardous substances and emergency responses to the release of hazardous substances
Summary: Establishes a computerized database containing information relating to the storage and handling of hazardous substances and emergency responses to the release of hazardous substances.

ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to establishing a computerized database containing information relating to the storage and handling of hazardous substances and emergency responses to the release of hazardous substances
